SELECT b.BOARD_ID, b.BOARD_TITLE, b.BOARD_CONTENT, b.BOARD_PUBLIC, b.BOARD_CREATED_DATE, b.BOARD_UPDATED_DATE, b.BOARD_VIEW_COUNT, b.BOARD_LIFE_CYCLE, b.BOARD_LIKE_COUNT, b.BOARD_YEAR, b.USER_ID, COALESCE(u2.USER_NICKNAME, k.NAME) AS NICKNAME, -- 사용자 닉네임 (우선순위: GGHJ_USER -> GGHJ_KAKAO) k.PROFILE_PIC, k.PROVIDER, f.USER_FILE_PROFILE_NAME, f.USER_FILE_PROFILE_SOURCE, f.USER_FILE_PROFILE_UUID FROM GGHJ_BOARD b JOIN GGHJ_UNI u ON b.USER_ID = u.UNI_ID LEFT JOIN GGHJ_USER u2 ON u.USER_ID = u2.USER_ID LEFT JOIN GGHJ_KAKAO k ON u.KAKAO_ID = k.KAKAO_ID LEFT JOIN GGHJ_USER_FILE f ON u2.USER_ID = f.USER_ID WHERE b.BOARD_LIFE_CYCLE = #{boardLifeCycle}

SELECT board_id, user_id, board_title, board_content, board_file_source_name, board_file_name, user_nickname, board_rank, USER_FILE_PROFILE_SOURCE, board_created_date, board_view_count FROM ( SELECT board_id, user_id, board_title, board_content, board_file_source_name, board_file_name, user_nickname, board_rank, USER_FILE_PROFILE_SOURCE, board_created_date, board_view_count, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY board_rank ORDER BY board_id DESC) AS row_num FROM ( SELECT b.board_id, b.user_id, b.board_title, b.board_content, bf.board_file_source_name, bf.board_file_name, COALESCE(u.user_nickname, k.name) AS user_nickname, DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY b.board_view_count DESC) AS board_rank, FIRST_VALUE(COALESCE(k.PROFILE_PIC, uf.USER_FILE_PROFILE_SOURCE)) OVER (PARTITION BY b.board_id ORDER BY b.board_id) AS USER_FILE_PROFILE_SOURCE, b.board_created_date, b.board_view_count FROM gghj_board b FULL OUTER JOIN gghj_board_file bf ON b.board_id = bf.board_id FULL OUTER JOIN gghj_uni gu ON b.user_id = gu.user_id FULL OUTER JOIN gghj_user u ON gu.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN gghj_kakao k ON gu.kakao_id = k.kakao_id FULL OUTER JOIN GGHJ_USER_FILE uf ON gu.uni_id = uf.USER_ID ) ranked_boards WHERE board_id IN ( SELECT board_id FROM ( SELECT board_id, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY board_view_count DESC) AS board_rank FROM gghj_board ) ranked_boards WHERE board_rank <= 4 ) ) ranked_boards_with_row_num WHERE row_num <= 4 ORDER BY board_rank, board_id

SELECT board_id, board_title, board_content, board_file_source_name, board_file_name, board_file_uuid, user_id, user_nickname, board_rank, USER_FILE_PROFILE_SOURCE, USER_FILE_PROFILE_NAME, USER_FILE_PROFILE_UUID, board_created_date, board_view_count FROM ( SELECT b.board_id, b.board_title, b.board_content, bf.board_file_source_name, bf.board_file_name, bf.board_file_uuid, b.user_id, COALESCE(u.user_nickname, k.name) AS user_nickname, DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY b.board_view_count DESC) AS board_rank, FIRST_VALUE(COALESCE(k.PROFILE_PIC, uf.USER_FILE_PROFILE_SOURCE)) OVER (PARTITION BY b.board_id ORDER BY b.board_id) AS USER_FILE_PROFILE_SOURCE, FIRST_VALUE(uf.USER_FILE_PROFILE_NAME) OVER (PARTITION BY b.board_id ORDER BY b.board_id) AS USER_FILE_PROFILE_NAME, -- 추가된 컬럼 FIRST_VALUE(uf.USER_FILE_PROFILE_UUID) OVER (PARTITION BY b.board_id ORDER BY b.board_id) AS USER_FILE_PROFILE_UUID, -- 추가된 컬럼 b.board_created_date, b.board_view_count FROM gghj_board b FULL OUTER JOIN gghj_board_file bf ON b.board_id = bf.board_id FULL OUTER JOIN gghj_uni gu ON b.user_id = gu.user_id OR b.user_id = gu.kakao_id FULL OUTER JOIN gghj_user u ON gu.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN gghj_kakao k ON gu.kakao_id = k.kakao_id FULL OUTER JOIN GGHJ_USER_FILE uf ON gu.uni_id = uf.USER_ID WHERE b.board_id IS NOT NULL ) ranked_boards WHERE board_rank <= 1 AND rownum = 1 ORDER BY board_rank

SELECT board_id, uni_id AS user_id, board_title, board_content, board_file_source_name, board_file_name, board_file_uuid, user_nickname, board_rank, USER_FILE_PROFILE_SOURCE, USER_FILE_PROFILE_NAME, USER_FILE_PROFILE_UUID, board_created_date, board_view_count FROM ( SELECT b.board_id, gu.uni_id, b.board_title, b.board_content, bf.board_file_source_name, bf.board_file_name, bf.board_file_uuid, COALESCE(u.user_nickname, k.name) AS user_nickname, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY b.board_view_count DESC) AS board_rank, COALESCE(k.PROFILE_PIC, uf.USER_FILE_PROFILE_SOURCE) AS USER_FILE_PROFILE_SOURCE, uf.user_file_profile_name AS USER_FILE_PROFILE_NAME, uf.user_file_profile_uuid AS USER_FILE_PROFILE_UUID, b.board_created_date, b.board_view_count FROM gghj_board b FULL OUTER JOIN gghj_board_file bf ON b.board_id = bf.board_id FULL OUTER JOIN gghj_uni gu ON b.user_id = gu.user_id OR b.user_id = gu.kakao_id FULL OUTER JOIN gghj_user u ON gu.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN gghj_kakao k ON gu.kakao_id = k.kakao_id FULL OUTER JOIN GGHJ_USER_FILE uf ON gu.uni_id = uf.USER_ID WHERE b.board_id IS NOT NULL AND b.board_title IS NOT NULL AND b.board_content IS NOT NULL AND COALESCE(u.user_nickname, k.name) IS NOT NULL ) ranked_boards WHERE board_rank BETWEEN 2 AND 3
